entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 07:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 07:25 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 07:25 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:25 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
